div.p: cr-xq-mets is a fork of SADE developed with basically the same goals, but certain changes in the system design:

ul.li: It adopts METS format for maintaining the structure of the projects.
It supports multiple projects on one application instance
It strictly separates between the logic, the layout, the data and the configuration
The layout templates are maintained separately and can be reused (and customized) by the projects
It supports project-specific overriding of any part of the template (html-snippets, js, css)

div.h3: How do I customize this page?

ul.li: Create a static/content collection in your project folder.

div.h3: Don't forget to add an impressum for your project!

ul.li: Copy the impressum.xml from /db/apps/cr-xq-mets/templates/minimal/content/ to static/content.
